ValidationRule.description: Ensures the primary owner is a client in their primary household
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (NOT( ISBLANK( FinServ__JointOwner__r.Household_Lookup__c ) ) && NOT( FinServ__JointOwner__r.OW_role_in_primary_household__c = "Client" ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Household__r.Type, "Trust" )) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Household__r.FinServ__Status__c, "Inactive" ))) && NOT( $Permission.ValidationBypass )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The joint owner must have a role of client in the household.
